p.6: ONSITE - Must be near ATO. Hybrid schedule onsite about 2 days a week
p.8: The Engineer will support the Combination Product Operations organization by improving the way client manages and utilizes data to enhance data analysis and decision making within the organization. We are seeking a highly motivated individual who will be primarily responsible for analyzing scientific and business data. This individual will leverage in-silico and mathematical modeling to evaluate potential opportunities that enable changes in business and operation performance.
p.10: The ideal candidate enjoys tackling challenges and excels at organizing information from numerous sources to provide well-constructed deliverables.
p.11: This may include, but is not limited to, the following:
p.12: =E2=80=A2 Working with large quantities of data to enable general workflows such as data processing, cleaning, and labeling.
p.13: =E2=80=A2 Developing, enhancing, automating, and managing analytics models
p.14: =E2=80=A2 Creating striking visualizations to aid in data interpretation and usage
p.15: =E2=80=A2 Demonstrating modeling and visualization approaches as part of proof-of-concept projects
p.16: =E2=80=A2 Initiating and supporting the digitalization of experimental workflows.
p.19: =E2=80=A2 Experience with model simulation and analysis (MS&A) techniques for structural, fluidic, and heat transfer problems using commercial software
p.20: =E2=80=A2 Experience with MATLAB, and/or R, Python.
p.21: =E2=80=A2 Data analysis expertise and statistical or mechanistic modeling experience are required.
p.22: =E2=80=A2 Experience with mathematical / first principles modeling and numerical techniques for model calibration and uncertainty quantification such as Monte Carlo simulations.
p.23: =E2=80=A2 Providing documentation and technical support for internal customers
p.24: =E2=80=A2 Deriving technical parameters and specifications from measured data
p.25: =E2=80=A2 Experience with data visualization tools or packages, such as Spotfire
p.26: =E2=80=A2 Strong communication skills are a plus, as is knowledge of process controls
p.27: =E2=80=A2 Understanding business needs and developing novel yet practical solutions to meet those needs
p.28: =E2=80=A2 Experience with combination products and device regulatory requirements and medical device development and engineering.
p.30: =E2=80=A2 Passion for proactively identifying opportunities through creative data analysis and modeling
p.31: =E2=80=A2 Intellectual curiosity with ability to learn new concepts/frameworks, algorithms and technology rapidly as needs arise
p.32: =E2=80=A2 Ability to manage multiple, competing priorities simultaneously
p.33: =E2=80=A2 Ability to deliver work and provide positive leadership in a fast-paced, multi-project team-oriented environment.
p.34: =E2=80=A2 Ability to work in highly collaborative, cross-functional environments
p.36: Bachelor's degree in Science or Engineering plus 2 years of data analysis experience
p.38: Master's degree in Science or Engineering
